pyworld3.specials¶

Functions

clip(func2, func1, t[, t_switch])

Logical function used as time switch to change parameter value.

func_delay1(out_, t_, in_, del_)

Computes the derivative of out_ at time t_, for the 1st order delay.

func_delay3(out_, t_, in_, del_)

Computes the derivative of out_ at time t_, for the 3rd order delay.

ramp(slope, t_offset, t)

Affine function with provided slope, clipped at 0 for t < t_offset.

switch(var1, var2, boolean_switch)

Logical function returning var1 if boolean_switch is False, else var2.

Classes

Delay3(in_arr, dt, t[, method])

Delay function of the 3rd order.

DlInf1

alias of Smooth

Dlinf3(in_arr, dt, t[, method])

Delay information function of the 3rd order for smoothing.

Smooth(in_arr, dt, t[, method])

Delay information function of the 1st order for smoothing.
